participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, always seeking new experiences and connections.
participant_1.background: I'm in an open polyamorous relationship. I've three dogs. I like to watch the Olympics. My father was a door-to-door salesman. I also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a passion for teaching and photography.
participant_2.background: I am fluent in English, Spanish, and French. My boyfriend and I are moving into an apartment together next week. My favorite colors are red and silver. I am interested in photography and like taking pictures. I am an elementary school teacher.
